run: let boost = 10;if (player.onGround) player.canDash = true;if (keys.shift && player.canDash && !player.onGround) {if (keys.a) player.vx = -boost;else if (keys.d) player.vx = boost;else if (player.vx < 0) player.vx = -boost;else if (player.vx > 0) player.vx = boost;player.canDash = false;}
message: You have gained the ability to dash! Press shift to dash in the direction you are moving.
